ygData.subject: RE: Langseax quest?
ygData.msgSnippet: Orc wrist bands, where do these come from? Doh...orcs out in Everfrost? Fergot about them..been along time since I been to my homeland. And, how rare of a drop
ygData.messageBody:
Orc wrist bands, where do these come from? Doh...orcs out in Everfrost?
Fergot about them..been along time since I been to my homeland. And, how
rare of a drop are the wrist bands?

-----Original Message-----
From: Beth [mailto:jaguar@...]
Sent: Tuesday, August 17, 1999 3:47 PM
To: EQCheats@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQCheats] Langseax quest?


From: Beth <jaguar@...>

You go to the pit of doom, there is a warrior lysbeth something, she's
the only one actually in the pit, and you have to give her 4 orc wrist
bands. You get weapon.

> Jonathan wrote:
>
> Anyone know where in Halas this quest can be completed and how hard it
> is? This weapon has pretty damn good stats (6/23 weight 4), almost
> identical to a silvery war axe and much better than a combine weapon.
> It's not lore so it can be dual weald as well. Any help would be
> appreciated.
